channel.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
channel.description:
Ok someone close has requested me to make a site and I said yes but then the demands came in and after thinkin about it seems quite demanding. Hes a photographer and wants a website where he can upload his images and sell them online, through paypal or something similar.. Could anyone help, send me an email/add kimler_2003@hotmail.com,
Thanks!

item.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

That image gallery looks pretty sweet, ill have to give it a try… But yes, figuring out the best way for payment is the problem unless he sells each photo for the same price, I havent really played around with paypal to know what offers are available. Im going to try out the php/mysql gallery first and see what happens from there,

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?

item.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I think the problem he is having is more with the payment than the uploading the images.

Read full topic
item.source: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?

item.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

So you want a gallery, and to be able to let them preview the images at the highest resolution possible to gain more sales, without it being easily stolen. You could probably watermark them also.

Doesn’t sound too bad, as long as you don’t need anything too dynamic.

Read full topic
item.source: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?

item.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Here’s a free PHP/MySQL based image gallery…
http://www.outofthetrees.co.uk/selectapix/index.php
If you wanted to add the ability to buy photos, you would have to add a button under each photo with a link to paypal or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?

item.title: Website - Need CLOSE help - possible payment?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Well, what do you need help with? Be more specific, if you post your requests here, loads of people can help you with any trouble you might have.

Read full topic
